classes.concretereceiver

Class BoardReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.concretereceiver.BoardReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Receiver, Recordable

    public class BoardReceiver
extends java.lang.Object
implements Receiver, Recordable
    Object of type Receiver Handles all the actions executed by the concrete commands Insert, Selection, Paste, Delete, Cut, Copy

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Buffer buffer
      Object that stores the user's input When there is an insert, paste or delete action
      private ClipBoard clipboard
      Object that stores temporary content of the buffer When there is a copy or cut action
      private Ranger ranger
      Object that deals with the selection When there is a select action
      private Recorder recorder
      Engine where to record the mementos for the do/undo functionality

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BoardReceiver()
      Preferred constructor of the engine Internal objects include Buffer ClipBoard Ranger

      Auxiliary Constructor

      • select

        public void select(int start,
                   int end)
        Specified by:
        select in interface Receiver
        Parameters:
        start - which is the starting point of the selection
        end - which is the ending point of the selection if the selection is set out of boundaries then selection is made on the whole content

      • copy

        public void copy()
        handles the action of copying the selection to the clipboard. We can only perform this action on the assurance that the ranger is not empty
        Specified by:
        copy in interface Receiver

      • cut

        public void cut()
        handles the action of cutting the selection from the buffer and copying it to the clipboard We can only perform a cut action on the assurance that the ranger is not empty
        Specified by:
        cut in interface Receiver
